text: kemi‘iminanimi yeẖonu huleti ch’ifirochi bīgadelu bemekakelachewi āsitarik’u፡፡ kehuletu ānidenyayitumi belēlayitu layi weseni bitalifi yachini weseni yemitalifewini wede ālahi ti‘izazi isikemitimelesi diresi tegadelu፡፡ bitimelesimi bemekakelachewi betikikili āsitarik’u፡፡ benegeru hulu āsitekakilumi፡፡ ālahi āsitekakayochini yiwedalina፡፡
